mapper.insert: insert into party (p_name, p_start_info, p_end_info, p_XY, p_time, p_capacity, p_content, p_generate_date, p_password, p_riding_km, p_riding_time) values (#{p_name},#{p_start_info},#{p_end_info},#{p_XY},#{p_time},#{p_capacity},#{p_content},default,#{p_password},#{p_riding_km},#{p_riding_time})
mapper.select: select * from party order by p_num desc
select * from party where p_closedYN='N' order by p_num desc;
select * from party where p_closedYN='Y' order by p_num desc;
select count(*) from participation pc join party pt on pc.p_num = pt.p_num where u_idx=#{idx} and p_closedYN='N';
select pc.p_num from participation pc join party pt on pc.p_num = pt.p_num where u_idx=#{idx} and p_closedYN='N';
mapper.update: update participation set pc_readyYN=#{readyYN} where p_num=#{p_num} and u_idx=#{u_idx}
update participation set pc_endYN='Y', pc_finishYN=#{finishYN} where p_num=#{p_num} and u_idx=#{u_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from participation where p_num=#{p_num} and u_idx=#{u_idx}
mapper.select: select * from participation p join run_bike.user u on p.u_idx=u.u_idx where p_num=#{p_num};
select count(*) from participation where p_num=#{num};
select u_idx from participation where p_num=#{num} and pc_masterYN='Y';
mapper.update: update participation set pc_masterYN='N' where p_num=#{num} and pc_masterYN='Y';
update participation set pc_masterYN='Y' where p_num=#{p_num} and u_idx=#{u_idx};
mapper.select: select if((select pc_endYN from participation where p_num=#{p_num} and u_idx=#{u_idx})='Y', 1, 0);
select count(*) from run_bike.participation where p_num=#{num} and pc_readyYN='N';
mapper.update: update party set p_name=#{p_name}, p_start_info=#{p_start_info}, p_end_info=#{p_end_info}, p_XY=#{p_XY}, p_time=#{p_time}, p_capacity=#{p_capacity}, p_content=#{p_content}, p_password=#{p_password}, p_riding_km=#{p_riding_km}, p_riding_time=#{p_riding_time} where p_num=#{p_num};
update party set p_start_time=current_timestamp() where p_num=#{p_num};
